sentences.english: In tenth-century France, the doors of traitors and criminals were painted yellow.
sentences.chinese: 在十世紀的法國，叛徒和罪犯的門都被漆成黃色。

sentences.english: In the United States, the emphasis on individual autonomy usually results in stigmatization of the accused offender.
sentences.chinese: 在美國，強調個人主義，通常會導致罪犯被告上法庭。

sentences.english: Had the policemen arrived immediately, the criminal would have been caught.
sentences.chinese: 若是警察立刻到，就會抓獲罪犯。

sentences.english: At the same time, this fact fetter the trick of the judicial authority, indulge the criminal.
sentences.chinese: 同時也束縛了司法機關的手腳，造成寬縱罪犯的後果。

sentences.english: The law deprives criminals of their right to vote.
sentences.chinese: 法律剝奪了罪犯的選舉權。

sentences.english: He has been consorting with known criminals.
sentences.chinese: 他一直與那些臭名昭著的罪犯有交往。

sentences.english: The criminal who looted the bank has been hounded down.
sentences.chinese: 搶劫銀行的那名罪犯已被捉拿歸案了。

sentences.english: Prisoners are accorded the material treatment necessary in their daily lives.
sentences.chinese: 罪犯享有必要的物質生活待遇。

sentences.english: Her testimony helped put several of the perpetrators behind bars.
sentences.chinese: 她的證詞將幾個罪犯送進了監獄。

sentences.english: The police are off beam in their search for the criminal.
sentences.chinese: 警察搜尋罪犯時方向錯了。

sentences.english: A bus conductor caught the criminal.
sentences.chinese: 一個公車售票員抓住了罪犯。

sentences.english: As everyone knows, Australia is entirely peopled with criminals.
sentences.chinese: 衆所周知，澳大利亞是一個罪犯之國。

sentences.english: I play judge, jury, convict and victim.
sentences.chinese: 我扮演着法官，陪同審判團，罪犯和遭到殺害者。

sentences.english: The resocialization of criminals is the main content of criminal reformation.
sentences.chinese: 對罪犯的再社會化是改造罪犯工作的核心內容。
